overview: Tanya Allen, Paul Young, Eric Coulter, Kathy Avrich-Johnson, Jonathan Pryce, Stuart Bunce, David Hayman, Julian Fellowes, Allan Scott, Eddie Dick, Mark Shivas, John Neville, Dougray Scott, Jonny Lee Miller, Gillies MacKinnon, James Wilby, Alastair Galbraith, Eileen Nicholas, Pat Barke.
title: Behind the Lines (Regeneration)
